## Histogram of Normal Random Variable

Create a plot in ggplot2:
```{r}
require(ggplot2)
x=rnorm(1000)
hist(x)
```

## Unordered Lists

* Main point 1
* Main point 2
  + Sub point 2a
  + Sub point 2b
  
One sample $t$ confidence interval for mean:
$$
\bar X \pm t^* \frac{s}{\sqrt{n}}
$$
